opportunity.title: ATP - series of fortunate events
opportunity.author: typicode
opportunity.positives: ATP in a strong uptrend previously, good fundamentals as potentially undervalued given debt and revemue growth, and earlier pearl production issues no longer impacting forecasts.
opportunity.Negatives: natural disasters issues a potential risk to production, potential weak demand during global recession.
opportunity.Technical: Falling wedge potentially bouncing off double bottom, also bouncing off 20d SMA on 6 month price low.
opportunity.Tip: What for next. A breakout of the wedge, potential fakeout before hand so maybe able to buy lower, look for confirmation via.
